notes.text: sap.suite.ui.microchart: Fiori 2.0 design implemented (Belize theme)
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Fiori 2.0 design implemented (Belize Plus theme)
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Color calculation for empty targetValue property stabilized
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: improve CSS dependent rendering to avoid miss rendering
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: CSS-dependent rendering improved to avoid incorrect rendering
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Fix UTF character handling
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Check for actual value inserted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Line endings in HCB corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Chart width after an orientation change adjusted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Click event handling for ComparisonMicroChart in GenericTile adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: KPIs not showing in IE fixed
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Tooltip handling is changed to solve screen reader issue
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Vertical position of value label enhanced
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Rendering behavior during initialization of the controls corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Display in GenericTile after Device orientation change corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.HarveyBallMicroChart: Labels are no longer visible after app navigation
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ColumnMicroChart: Hover style in case of non interactive column corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Resizing works inside the GenericTile control
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: HCB text color corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Actual value bar and marker improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Color handling for chart and target corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ColumnMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: Responsiveness of labels adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Test page improved
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Label truncation for Internet Explorer and Edge corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: If percentage value is 0, percentageMode still enabled
